analysis.description:
SetherBaseCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x20bf6672497941bd3e4ec5fd551de5c31e0a898a.sol#316-338) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x20bf6672497941bd3e4ec5fd551de5c31e0a898a.sol#333-334)

SetherCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x20bf6672497941bd3e4ec5fd551de5c31e0a898a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,ownerShareTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x20bf6672497941bd3e4ec5fd551de5c31e0a898a.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x20bf6672497941bd3e4ec5fd551de5c31e0a898a.sol:
